TopicTitle: No love for Titan- the Mission

Articles.Content: There are loads of Ares (Voyage) replicas on the forums. But, I have not seen a single replica of another Stephen Baxter book, Titan, about a space shuttle being taken to titan.  So, can anybody make a Titan playthrough?

Added to kobo wishlist.

After that, hold my beer.

 

Do you mean Ares from The Martian?

Edited September 14, 2017 by icantmakemodels
